content:
The UTG project is updating the current build content at build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/UTG/ to include information and direct links to educational material. We will update the community here when it is complete. In the meantime, please make sure you are accessing UTG from the current build as Version 1.0.0 (terminology.hl7.org) was a prototype to debug the content, process and tooling. The content there is insufficient and should be consumed with that in mind.

Currently the UTG Jira project is focused on recording and shepherding HL7 terminology content changes through consensus review. Its use will be extended to include the workflow to record and resolve requests for changes to the supporting content on terminology.hl7.org.
We now have the information noted above in the Documentation tab (previously the Background tab). We have noticed the typo in 'Documentation' on the page and that is being fixed.
